survey_name: Customer Satisfaction with Electric Bike Sharing Programs Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to evaluate customer satisfaction and identify areas for improvement in electric bike sharing programs across urban areas.

questions.question_text: How frequently do you use electric bike sharing services?
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice radio button for clarity. Ensure options cover all likely usage frequencies.

script.question_text: How frequently do you use electric bike sharing services?

questions.question_text: What factors influenced your decision to use an electric bike sharing program? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Use checkboxes for multiple selections. Include an 'Other' option to capture unique responses.

script.question_text: What factors influenced your decision to use an electric bike sharing program? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the availability of electric bikes in your area?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale for consistent measurement. Ensure the scale is balanced.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the availability of electric bikes in your area?

questions.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for the electric bike sharing program?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to capture qualitative feedback. Ensure the text box is large enough for detailed responses.

script.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for the electric bike sharing program?

questions.question_text: How likely are you to recommend the electric bike sharing program to others?
questions.client_notes: Use a standard NPS-like scale for easy benchmarking. Ensure the question is clear and concise.

script.question_text: How likely are you to recommend the electric bike sharing program to others?
